name: BibleSuggestion
0:
”Alexa ask bible suggestion about love”
”Alexa ask bible suggestion for love”
”Alexa ask bible suggestion love”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible suggestion
des: This skill speaks a bible verse suggestion for the word that you reuest. For example, to get a Bible verse for the word "love" you would say: " Alexa, ask Bible Suggestion to suggest a Bible verse for love"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
